@@ -0,0 +1,56 @@
+#!/bin/bash
+
+set -euo pipefail -x
+
+. "${BASH_SOURCE%/*}/common.sh"
+
+start_docker_containers
+
+# insert Azure credentials
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container cp /etc/hadoop/conf/core-site.xml.wasb-template /etc/hadoop/conf/core-site.xml
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container sed -i \
+  -e "s|%WASB_ACCESS_KEY%|${WASB_ACCESS_KEY}|g" \
+  -e "s|%WASB_ACCOUNT%|${WASB_ACCOUNT}|g" \
+  /etc/hadoop/conf/core-site.xml
+
+# create test table
+table_path="wasb://${WASB_CONTAINER}@${WASB_ACCOUNT}.blob.core.windows.net/presto_test_external_fs_v2/"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -mkdir -p "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -copyFromLocal -f /tmp/test_table.csv{,.gz,.bz2,.lz4} "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container /usr/bin/hive -e "CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE presto_test_external_fs(t_bigint bigint) LOCATION '${table_path}'"
+
+table_path="wasb://${WASB_CONTAINER}@${WASB_ACCOUNT}.blob.core.windows.net/presto_test_external_fs_with_header/"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -mkdir -p "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -copyFromLocal -f /docker/files/test_table_with_header.csv{,.gz,.bz2,.lz4} "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container /usr/bin/hive -e "
+    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE presto_test_external_fs_with_header(t_bigint bigint)
+    STORED AS TEXTFILE
+    LOCATION '${table_path}'
+    TBLPROPERTIES ('skip.header.line.count'='1')"
+
+table_path="wasb://${WASB_CONTAINER}@${WASB_ACCOUNT}.blob.core.windows.net/presto_test_external_fs_with_header_and_footer/"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -mkdir -p "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -copyFromLocal -f /docker/files/test_table_with_header_and_footer.csv{,.gz,.bz2,.lz4} "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container /usr/bin/hive -e "
+    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE presto_test_external_fs_with_header_and_footer(t_bigint bigint)
+    STORED AS TEXTFILE
+    LOCATION '${table_path}'
+    TBLPROPERTIES ('skip.header.line.count'='2', 'skip.footer.line.count'='2')"
+
+stop_unnecessary_hadoop_services
+
+# run product tests

+#!/bin/bash
+
+set -euo pipefail -x
+
+. "${BASH_SOURCE%/*}/common.sh"
+
+start_docker_containers
+
+# insert Azure credentials
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container cp /etc/hadoop/conf/core-site.xml.wasb-template /etc/hadoop/conf/core-site.xml
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container sed -i \
+  -e "s|%WASB_ACCESS_KEY%|${WASB_ACCESS_KEY}|g" \
+  -e "s|%WASB_ACCOUNT%|${WASB_ACCOUNT}|g" \
+  /etc/hadoop/conf/core-site.xml
+
+# create test table
+table_path="wasb://${WASB_CONTAINER}@${WASB_ACCOUNT}.blob.core.windows.net/presto_test_external_fs_v2/"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -mkdir -p "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -copyFromLocal -f /tmp/test_table.csv{,.gz,.bz2,.lz4} "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container /usr/bin/hive -e "CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE presto_test_external_fs(t_bigint bigint) LOCATION '${table_path}'"
+
+table_path="wasb://${WASB_CONTAINER}@${WASB_ACCOUNT}.blob.core.windows.net/presto_test_external_fs_with_header/"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -mkdir -p "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -copyFromLocal -f /docker/files/test_table_with_header.csv{,.gz,.bz2,.lz4} "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container /usr/bin/hive -e "
+    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE presto_test_external_fs_with_header(t_bigint bigint)
+    STORED AS TEXTFILE
+    LOCATION '${table_path}'
+    TBLPROPERTIES ('skip.header.line.count'='1')"
+
+table_path="wasb://${WASB_CONTAINER}@${WASB_ACCOUNT}.blob.core.windows.net/presto_test_external_fs_with_header_and_footer/"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -mkdir -p "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -copyFromLocal -f /docker/files/test_table_with_header_and_footer.csv{,.gz,.bz2,.lz4} "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container /usr/bin/hive -e "

+    STORED AS TEXTFILE
+    LOCATION '${table_path}'
+    TBLPROPERTIES ('skip.header.line.count'='2', 'skip.footer.line.count'='2')"
+
+stop_unnecessary_hadoop_services

@@ -0,0 +1,61 @@
+#!/bin/bash
+
+set -euo pipefail -x
+
+. ${BASH_SOURCE%/*}/common.sh
+
+start_docker_containers
+
+# insert Azure credentials
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container cp /etc/hadoop/conf/core-site.xml.adl-template /etc/hadoop/conf/core-site.xml
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container sed -i \
+  -e "s|%ADL_CLIENT_ID%|${ADL_CLIENT_ID}|g" \
+  -e "s|%ADL_CREDENTIAL%|${ADL_CREDENTIAL}|g" \
+  -e "s|%ADL_REFRESH_URL%|${ADL_REFRESH_URL}|g" \
+  /etc/hadoop/conf/core-site.xml
+
+# create test table
+table_path="adl://${ADL_NAME}.azuredatalakestore.net/presto_test_external_fs_2/"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -mkdir -p "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -copyFromLocal -f /tmp/test_table.csv{,.gz,.bz2,.lz4} "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container /usr/bin/hive -e "CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE presto_test_external_fs(t_bigint bigint) LOCATION '${table_path}'"
+
+table_path="adl://${ADL_NAME}.azuredatalakestore.net/presto_test_external_fs_with_header/"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -mkdir -p "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -copyFromLocal -f /docker/files/test_table_with_header.csv{,.gz,.bz2,.lz4} "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container /usr/bin/hive -e "
+    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE presto_test_external_fs_with_header(t_bigint bigint)
+    STORED AS TEXTFILE
+    LOCATION '${table_path}'
+    TBLPROPERTIES ('skip.header.line.count'='1')"
+
+table_path="adl://${ADL_NAME}.azuredatalakestore.net/presto_test_external_fs_with_header_and_footer/"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -mkdir -p "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container hadoop fs -copyFromLocal -f /docker/files/test_table_with_header_and_footer.csv{,.gz,.bz2,.lz4} "${table_path}"
+exec_in_hadoop_master_container /usr/bin/hive -e "
+    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE presto_test_external_fs_with_header_and_footer(t_bigint bigint)
+    STORED AS TEXTFILE
+    LOCATION '${table_path}'
+    TBLPROPERTIES ('skip.header.line.count'='2', 'skip.footer.line.count'='2')"
+
+stop_unnecessary_hadoop_services
+
+# run product tests
+pushd $PROJECT_ROOT
+set +e
+./mvnw -B -pl presto-hive-hadoop2 test -P test-hive-hadoop2-adl \
+  -DHADOOP_USER_NAME=hive \
+  -Dhive.hadoop2.metastoreHost=localhost \
+  -Dhive.hadoop2.metastorePort=9083 \
+  -Dhive.hadoop2.databaseName=default \
+  -Dhive.hadoop2.adl-name=${ADL_NAME} \
+  -Dhive.hadoop2.adl-client-id=${ADL_CLIENT_ID} \
+  -Dhive.hadoop2.adl-credential=${ADL_CREDENTIAL} \
+  -Dhive.hadoop2.adl-refresh-url=${ADL_REFRESH_URL}
+EXIT_CODE=$?
+set -e
+popd
+
+cleanup_docker_containers

nodes.bodyText:
HDFS_ENVIRONMENT is also used in the first setup method (the method calls the this one).
I'd suggest

move the new initialization of the hdfsEnvironment field to the first setup method
use hdfsEnvironment instead of HDFS_ENVIRONMENT everywhere
Remove this since it's already in HiveAzureModule

This should be checkArgument since it is validating the argument of the method. Also, it might be clearer to split this up
checkArgument(
        wasbAccessKey().isPresent() && !wasbAccessKey.get().isEmpty(),
        "wasb-storage-account is set, but wasb-access-key is not");
checkArgument(
        wasbStorageAccount.isPresent() && !wasbStorageAccount.get().isEmpty()
        "wasb-access-key is set, but wasb-storage-account is not");
Rather than document the required variables in the commit message, let's list them here
Do we need to restart the Hive metastore like we do for S3, to pick up the changes in core-site.xml?

@@ -0,0 +1,57 @@
+#!/usr/bin/env bash
+
+set -euo pipefail -x
+
+. "${BASH_SOURCE%/*}/common.sh"
+
+cleanup_docker_containers
+start_docker_containers
+
+# insert Azure credentials

nodes.bodyText: Can we remove this and change the script to use /docker/files so that it's consistent with the S3 tests?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -19,3 +19,4 @@ services:
       - ../../presto-hive/src/test/sql:/docker/sql:ro
       - ./files:/docker/files:ro
       - ./files/tez-site.xml:/etc/tez/conf/tez-site.xml:ro
+      - ./files/core-site.xml.wasb-template:/etc/hadoop/conf/core-site.xml.wasb-template:ro

nodes.bodyText: Nit: Is the azure- part redundant with wasb (since that's only for Azure)? We don't say aws-s3 just s3
Nit: lowercase "expected" to be consistent with the others
Same comments as wasb
checkArgument

Let's call this TestHiveAzure (and rename related things like Maven profile name)
The Client part is legacy/old and Hdinsight is a brand name that is different than what we call it elsewhere in the code. Calling it Azure makes it obvious what this is testing.

Mentioning S3 here seems wrong. Also, I don't think we need this, since we run against our own metastore that we configured to support the file system. The code in AbstractTestHiveFileSystem is legacy from when we tested against a generic metastore. (and could probably be removed)
checkArgument
If either abfsAccessKey or abfsStorageAccount is set, both must be set

Format like this so that it's clear this is intentionally empty
protected void onSetupComplete() {}
This is already shaded in Hadoop and should not be necessary
